title: ILinearPatternFeatureData.D1EndUseSpacing
description: Gets or sets whether to use spacing or a number of pattern instances when offsetting up-to reference geometry in Direction 1 for this linear pattern feature.
returns: True to use spacing, false to use number of pattern instances in Direction 1
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILinearPatternFeatureData::D1EndCondition
is set to
swPatternEndCondition_e
.swPatternEndCondition_UpToReference.
